## Overview of Areas

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-6}
### Objectives

The foundations that guide our research: the research statement, long-term objectives, and standard operating principles (SOPs).
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Research Context

The organizational and communicative context of our research: labs and research environments, mailing lists, and shared structures that enable coordination and exchange across projects.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Projects

Our active and past research projects: how projects are defined and scoped, how they evolve over time, and how we reflect on and improve our research practices.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Funding

How research is resourced and sustained: funding landscapes, opportunities, and guidance for identifying, preparing, and managing funded research projects.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Methods

Methodological guidance and research infrastructure: literature review and synthesis, survey design, data management, dataset handling, repository setup conventions, analysis templates, and computational systems supporting research.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Writing

Creating and refining scholarly work: outlet selection, writing practices, knowledge management, manuscript and presentation templates, collaboration in writing, revision and submission processes, publication workflows, and dissemination activities.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Peer Review

Contributing to the scholarly community through peer review and editorial work.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Output

Overview of our datasets, software, publications, and talks, supporting the visibility, reuse, and impact of research contributions.
:::
